String.1044: 那座小屋被杂草覆盖得很严实。
String.1045: 门锁着，最右边发着微弱的光……
object.pear.name: 梨子
object.pear.description: 一种甜美、果质软并常用于烘焙的水果。
object.pear-sapling.name: 梨子树苗
object.pear-sapling.description: 需要 28 天成长为成熟的梨树。春天结果。只有在附近 8 块“地块”都空置的情况下才会生长。
object.nectarine.name: 油桃
object.nectarine-sapling.name: 油桃树苗
object.nectarine-sapling.description: 需要 28 天成长为成熟的油桃树。夏天结果。只有在附近 8 块“地块”都空置的情况下才会生长。
object.persimmon.name: 柿子
object.persimmon-sapling.name: 柿子树苗
object.persimmon-sapling.description: 需要 28 天成长为成熟的柿子树。秋天结果。只有在附近 8 块“地块”都空置的情况下才会生长。
object.moneybag.name: 钱袋
object.tree-coin.name: 树币
object.tree-coin.description: 需要 28 天成长为成熟的摇钱树。在所有季节都可以产出钱袋。只有在附近 8 块“地块”都空置的情况下才会生长。
object.birch-seed.name: 桦树种子
object.birch-water.name: 桦树汁
object.birch-syrup.name: 桦树糖浆
object.birch-syrup.description: 一种稀有的粘稠糖浆，风味酷似焦糖。
object.fir-cone.name: 冷杉果
object.fir-wax.name: 冷杉蜡
object.fir-wax.description: 从冷杉树树液中提取出的一种光滑、油性的物质。
object.seed-cookie.name: 种子饼干
object.seed-cookie.description: 一种营养丰富、酥脆可口的零食，可迅速补充能量。
object.candy.name: 糖果
object.candy.description: 大多数人都喜欢的甜食。
object.cucumber.name: 黄瓜
object.cucumber-seed.name: 黄瓜种子
object.cucumber-seed.description: 春天播种。12 天成熟，收获之后还能继续结果。
object.butternut-squash.name: 奶油南瓜
object.butternut-squash.description: 常用于做汤、烤制和烘焙。
object.butternut-squash-seed.name: 奶油南瓜种子
object.sweet-potato.name: 红薯
object.sweet-potato.description: 一种富含淀粉、纤维素和抗氧化成分的甜味块根类蔬菜。
object.sweet-potato-seed.name: 红薯种子
object.gold-carrot.name: 金胡萝卜
object.gold-carrot.description: 一根灌注了神奇魔力的胡萝卜，光彩夺目而飘渺。
object.gold-carrot-seed.name: 金胡萝卜种子
object.gold-carrot-seed.description: 春天，夏天或秋天播种。6 天成熟。
object.fossilized-apple.name: 苹果化石
object.fossilized-apple.description: 这个古老的苹果经过了矿化作用的过程而形成，得令我们一瞥远古世界。
object.rusty-shield.name: 生锈的盾
object.rusty-shield.description: 经过战斗洗礼的厚重的铁盾牌。
object.amber.name: 琥珀
object.amber.description: 包含了某些史前昆虫的树脂化石。
object.stone-of-yoba.name: 由巴之石
object.stone-of-yoba.description: 一块古老的石板，刻着未知语言的文字和由巴的标志。
object.faded-button.name: 陈旧纽扣
object.faded-button.description: 曾属于某人的破旧纽扣。
object.boomerang.name: 回旋镖
object.boomerang.description: 一种远古时代的古老空气动力学狩猎工具，也曾用于娱乐活动。
object.old-coin.name: 老钱币
object.old-coin.description: 一种已经不再流通的废弃芬吉尔共和国钱币。
object.vegan-cone.description: 用椰奶制作的不含乳制品的冰淇淋。
object.ice-cream-sundae.name: 冰淇淋圣代
object.ice-cream-sundae.description: 淋了一层热巧克力软糖的香草冰淇淋，顶部由一颗樱桃点缀。
object.prismatic-pop.name: 五彩冰棒
object.prismatic-pop.description: 一种灌注了五彩碎片之精华的稀有、强力的冰淇淋。
object.chocolate-truffle-bar.name: 松露巧克力棒
object.chocolate-truffle-bar.description: 一种奢华、细腻的高级巧克力甜品，填有丝滑的奶油巧克力酱馅料。售价不菲。
object.small-hardwood-fence.name: 小硬木围栏
object.small-hardwood-fence.description: 只是一种样式不同的硬木围栏。
object.hedge-fence.name: 树篱围栏
object.hedge-fence.description: 可存续较长时间，会随季节变化而改变外观。
object.fish-dumpling.name: 鱼饺
object.fish-dumpling.description: 将搅炒过的鱼肉馅包在薄而软的面皮中制作的饺子。
object.gingerbread-man.name: 姜饼人
object.gingerbread-man.description: 一种令人愉悦的假日点心，点缀有俏皮的软糖纽扣。
object.nectarine-fruit-bread.name: 油桃水果面包
object.nectarine-fruit-bread.description: 精致的面包，点缀的些许油桃干预示着内在的美味。
object.ramen.name: 拉面
object.ramen.description: 一道来自戈特洛帝国的人气美食。
object.marsh-tonic.name: 沼泽滋补水
object.marsh-tonic.description: 闻着像潮湿的泥土。提供攻击、速度和防御加成。
object.baked-potato.name: 烤土豆
object.grilled-cheese-sandwich.name: 烤奶酪三明治
object.void-mayo-sandwich.name: 虚空蛋黄酱三明治
object.pineapple-custard-crepe.name: 菠萝卡仕达酱煎饼卷
object.pineapple-custard-crepe.descripti: 一款芳香四溢的稀有热带风情甜点。
object.glazed-pear.name: 糖釉梨
object.glazed-pear.description: 它会勾起你对家的回忆。
object.stuffed-persimmon.name: 塞料柿子
object.stuffed-persimmon.description: 它会诱惑你的感官、吸引你一品究竟。
object.cheese-charcuterie.name: 奶酪拼盘
object.cheese-charcuterie.description: 丰盛的奶酪和饼干组合，搭配了浓郁的黄油蘸酱。
object.butter.name: 黄油
object.shark-tooth.name: 鲨鱼牙
object.diamond-flower.name: 钻石花
object.viper-eel.name: 毒蝰鳗鱼
object.viper-eel.description: 有剧毒，具有警告潜在捕食者的红色警戒色。
object.alligator.name: 短吻鳄
object.alligator.description: 一种大型爬行动物，身体厚实，肌肉发达。
object.shark.name: 鲨鱼
object.ocean-sunfish.name: 翻车鱼
object.ocean-sunfish.description: 游得不快，不过可以长到极大的尺寸。
object.highlands-bass.name: 高地鲈鱼
object.tadpole.name: 蝌蚪
object.tadpole.description: 这位小朋友总有一天会长成一只青蛙。
object.barred-knifejaw.name: 条石鲷
object.barred-knifejaw.description: 通常生存于岩礁环绕的海洋地区。
object.diamond-carp.name: 钻石鲤鱼
object.diamond-carp.description: 表皮上镶嵌着一层薄薄的钻石。
object.blue-tang.name: 拟刺尾鲷
object.blue-tang.description: 一种受欢迎的鱼，以其蓝色和黄色而闻名。
object.arrowhead-shark.name: 箭头鲨
object.arrowhead-shark.description: 一种细长的鲨鱼，能够快速游动以捕捉猎物。
object.fiber-goby.name: 纤维虾虎鱼
object.fiber-goby.description: 喜欢在水下草丛中安家。
object.swamp-crab.name: 沼泽蟹
object.wolf-snapper.name: 狼鲷
object.goldfish.name: 金鱼
object.goldfish.description: 一种常见的观赏鱼，易于饲养。
object.gar.name: 雀鳝
object.gar.description: 身体细长的捕食者，以其他鱼类为食。
object.turretfish.name: 炮塔鱼
object.camel-wool.name: 骆驼毛
object.camel-wool.description: 常用于高品质纺织品的制作。
object.yarn.name: 纱线
object.yarn.description: 因其柔软和耐用的特点备受赞誉。
object.goose-egg.name: 鹅蛋
object.goose-egg.description: 一种味道可口、营养丰富的蛋。
object.golden-goose-egg.name: 金鹅蛋
object.goose-mayonnaise.name: 鹅蛋黄酱
object.goose-mayonnaise.description: 拥有浓厚的味道，很粘稠。
object.honey-jar.name: 蜂蜜罐
object.honey-jar.description: 熊的同伴们赠送的礼物。卖掉可以得到一大笔钱。
object.wind-totem.name: 微风图腾
object.wind-totem.description: 激活后，大大增加明天刮风的概率。在冬天使用无效。消耗品。
object.sun-totem.name: 太阳图腾
object.sun-totem.description: 激活后，大大增加明天晴天的概率。消耗品。
object.swamp-flower.name: 沼泽花
object.supernatural-goo.name: 超自然粘液
object.supernatural-goo.description: 一种散发出幽幽荧光的粘稠物质。
object.sludge.name: 烂泥
object.swamp-essence.name: 沼泽精华
object.swamp-essence.description: 触感冰冷。拥有神奇的魔力，常用于炼药。
object.mega-purple-mushroom.name: 巨型紫蘑菇
object.mega-purple-mushroom.description: 这世上最稀有的蘑菇，因其药用价值而极其抢手。
object.gold-slime-egg.name: 黄金史莱姆蛋
object.gold-slime-egg.description: 由纯金制成。虽然不能被孵化，但可以卖个好价。
object.magic-lamp.name: 神灯
object.castle-village-outpost-vendor-sch: 盖多兰前哨站商店时间表
object.bombardier-elixir.name: 投弹手药水
object.bombardier-elixir.description: 闻起来像是火药。大幅提升炸弹、弹弓、格挡和低伤害武器的攻击力。不能和速度增益叠加。
building.winery.name: 酿酒厂
building.winery.description: 提供一片充足的空间用于放置木桶，以及一片可以装饰的餐厅区域。使用木桶对酒进行陈酿所需的时间减少 15%。该建筑最多修建 1 座。
building.premium-coop.name: 豪华鸡舍
building.premium-coop.description: 可容纳 16 只家禽。附带自动抚摸机、自动采集器和加热器。
building.premium-barn.name: 豪华畜棚
building.premium-barn.description: 可容纳 16 只家畜。附带自动抚摸机、自动采集器和加热器。
animal.barn: A Barn is required for this animal
animal.coop: A Coop is required for this animal
animal.camel.name: 骆驼
animal.camel.description: 一种来自宝石海彼岸的异国动物。每隔一天产出珍贵的骆驼毛。饲养在畜棚里。
animal.goose.name: 鹅
animal.goose.description: 快乐的成年鹅每隔一天都会产下鹅蛋。饲养在鸡舍里。
animal.bear.name: 熊
animal.bear.description: 这是熊的一位朋友，它偶尔会发现一些蜂蜜罐。饲养在畜棚里。不消耗干草和草。
machine.butter-churner.name: 黄油搅拌机
machine.butter-churner.invalid: 物品栏中没有足够的奶类。
machine.yarn-spooler.name: 绕线机
machine.yarn-spooler.invalid: 物品栏中没有足够的骆驼毛。
weapon.monster-splitter.name: 怪物收割者
weapon.monster-splitter.description: 一把强大的盖多兰巨剑，非常难挥舞。
weapon.heavy-shield.name: 重盾
weapon.heavy-shield.description: 装备后可提供大量的防御属性。
Mail.SusanCooking: 亲爱的@，^你好！希望你在这个冬天里一切安好。我终于成功改良了姜饼人配方。这些美味的小家伙能用香甜的气味陪你度过每一个冬夜。^^还有，在你烤制时，整个屋子里都会弥漫着绝妙的味道哦！^    ——苏珊%item cookingRecipe Gingerbread Man %%[#]冬日小精灵
Mail.AndyCooking: 嘿，@，^我刚学到了点儿冷知识。你知道柿子吗？有的柿子树居然得磨叽十年才开始结果子。不过呢，这样我对它们就更得尊重了。我用觅食来的玩意儿做这种烘焙已经很久了，到现在还没找到比它更好的零食呢。^   ——安迪%item cookingRecipe %%[#]七年之礼
Mail.VictorCooking: @，^见信好，我最近在整理我家的书柜时，发现了一道我最喜欢的家传食谱——拉面！我敢打赌你绝对想不到我并非只喜欢意大利面这一种面食！^你看，就算是我，有时也能让你意想不到！^    ——维克多%item cookingRecipe %%[#]面面俱爱
Mail.OliviaCooking: 亲爱的@，^我最近一直在想家，你知道的，我的家乡非常的遥远。我想向你分享一道我一直珍藏着的食谱。^我的母亲总会在我情绪低落时做这个给我吃，来让我重新振作起来。我希望它也能为你带来一样的鼓舞^    ——奥利维亚%item cookingRecipe %%[#]来自另一位母亲的食谱
Mail.ClaireCooking: 你好！^速冻的 Joja 食品真的很不健康，对吧？我最近一直在尝试着吃得健康一些。^我邻居家的油桃园每到夏天就缀满果实，我也因此学会了“油桃水果面包”这一绝妙甜点的做法。如果你的农场上也种了油桃的话，那这绝对值得你试一试。^    ——克莱尔%item cookingRecipe %%[#]自制的美味
Mail.GuntherSilvianCooking: 亲爱的@，^我已经尝过了世界各地的料理了。比如戈特洛帝国的，芬群岛的，——我甚至还尝过一些矮人的料理。^但是对我来说，宣软的烤土豆无可匹敌。做的时候别吝啬黄油和盐。^   ——冈瑟%item cookingRecipe %%[#]简单的料理
Mail.ScarlettCooking: Hi, @!^You know what's better than goat cheese? A whole bunch of goat cheese and then some!^Here's a list of all my favorite types and how to organize them on a board. It's a great snack to share with friends, or someone special!  ^   -Scarlett%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Cheese Overload
Mail.MartinCooking: 嘿！^前几天我上班吃午餐的时候，突然想到也许你会喜欢我妈做的食谱！^她总是让我带一个她做的烤奶酪三明治去上班。而且不知怎的，每次它都能一直保持着完美的酥脆口感！^    ——马丁%item cookingRecipe %%[#]新鲜的更美味
Mail.MorganCooking: 您好，@!^每当我想家的时候，我就会自己做糖釉梨——一道我妈妈教我的拿手甜点。我想您应该也会喜欢的。结束了一天的学习或者工作后，吃一口这个真的让人感觉非常棒。记得一定要试一试！^    ——摩根%item cookingRecipe %%[#]家的味道
Mail.GusOrangeChicken: 嗨，@，^我发现了一道经典的菜谱——格兰普顿香橙鸡！你现在可以在餐吧里买到它了……这道菜所使用的香甜浓郁的酱汁，可以让任何情绪低落的人重新振作起来。如果你想吃的话，就来餐吧里尝尝吧！^    ——格斯[#]格兰普顿香橙鸡
Mail.HenchmanFired: You...^^You took something from my employer's home, causing me to lose my job...^... ... ...^Now I'm homeless. You must help... or else...^... ... ...^Come visit me at the marshlands. I will wait.^^    -Henchman[#]A Goblin in need
Mail.HenchmanMarshTonics: 我突然想起来我之前在我小屋的地板下面存了十几瓶沼泽滋补水。现在我找回了我的工作，所以我不需要它们了。尽管瓶子上可能落了一层厚厚的灰，但是它们的功效可依然还在！^    ——仆从%item object FlashShifter.StardewValleyExpandedCP_Marsh_Tonic 12 %%[#]落灰的沼泽滋补水
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.001: 家里不舒服吗？#$e#我真地，真地很喜欢这个农场！$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.002: 我费了好大功夫才把房间打扫干净。$0
Scarlett.funLeave.default: 嘿！我今天要办点事，我一会儿就回来！$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.005: 嗯……你觉得我是把我的旧兔子玩具给宝宝玩，还是买只新的更好？$0#$e#应该买只新的更好一点，这样他们就能一起创造一整套全新的，美好的回忆。$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.006: 我前几天读到一篇文章，虽然你可能觉得山羊奶对宝宝是安全的，但其实根本不是这样的！$0#$e#嗯……不过我之前也是这么以为的啦。$7
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.007: 啦，啦，啦……$1#$e#%kid1在我唱歌的时候会突然兴奋起来，也许长大后会成为一名伟大的艺人也说不定呢。$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.008: 你觉得%kid1需要兄弟姐妹吗？$0#$e#独生子女总归是有点孤独……$7
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.009: 嗯……%kid2比%kid1更能平心静气一点。$0#$e#希望他们以后不会利用这点吧。$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.010: 我的爸爸们对当爷爷超级兴奋，现在他们更是双倍兴奋！$1#$e#你觉得等孩子们会说话了，会怎么叫他们呢？爷爷？还是老头子？$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.011: 啊……$2#%e#抱歉，一切都好，只是两个小孩有时很难照顾。$5
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.012: 我觉得两个孩子刚刚好。$0#$e#“孩子”，呵呵。倒是比小山羊可爱多了。$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.013: 今天有一整天的空闲，你打算做点什么？$0#$e#哦对！听着就不错。$1#$b#嗯，你知道在哪能找到我的对吧。
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.014: 这个时间段感到肌肉酸痛正说明你度过了充实的一天！$1#$e#我已经等不及要睡觉了，真想马上躺床上啊。$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.015: 我无需在雨天工作，但这绝非允许我惰怠的理由。$1#$e#*接吻*　哦，呃……我只是想说，$4#$b#别在外面感冒了好不好？$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.016: 这场雨让整个山谷的空气都清新起来了……$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.017: 我只知道今天一定会很棒！$1#$e#哦对，如果你对晚餐有什么想法的话记得告诉我一下哦。$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.018: 我喜欢春天的时候去地里干活。夏天太热，冬天又太冷。$0#$b#而我心爱的春天刚刚好！$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.019: 你觉得这鬼天气能不能很快凉下来？$2
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.020: 这些叶子怎么老是往家里跑！$6#$e#算了，我来处理吧。$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.022: 春季到了啊,@，那个叫，“万物复苏”，你呢，还不复苏一下嘛？$1#$e#*笑*来吧，一扫冬天的惰态，开荒！$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.023: 你今年要参加彩蛋大寻宝吗？$0#$e#一只鸡，一整天，一个蛋……而这里摆着这么多蛋。$1#$e#玛妮和谢恩肯定攒了好久。$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.024: 哇，我已经等不及要看大家一起跳舞了。$1#$e#当然啦，我想你和我跳，好吗？$4
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.025: 春天就是为了农忙做准备啦。夏天才是真正的农耕季！$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.026: 嗯……我发誓我能闻到阳光的气味，你能理解这种感觉嘛？$0#$e#其实吧，阳光闻起来有点像你，哈哈。$4*笑*
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.027: 夏威夷宴会！……欸，我要带的东西呢？真的是，东西总是不看就没了。$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.028: 你觉得这些发着微光的月光水母看着像什么？$0#$e#我觉得像田里上下飞舞的萤火虫，都散发着很好看的微光。$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.029: 要我说，农耕生活就像个故事，而夏末和初秋就是高潮部分！$0#$e#葡萄园的葡萄摘了，我们能在展览会上尽情展示……$0#$b#每年秋天我都心情特好！
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.030: 你今年参加展览会吗, @？$0#$e#你的付出和努力我都看在眼里，你绝对能拿冠军！$1#$e#不过索菲娅也的确不可小觑，要当心！$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.031: 迷宫时间到！$1#$e#我跟索菲娅打赌能比她还快。$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.032: *叹息*　……秋天的最后一丝痕迹也要消失了。$5#$e#看着秋天结束，我心中还是有些惆怅……$7#$b#但幸好还有你的陪伴，陪我度过这最后的秋色。$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.033: 我有点怀念爸爸以前在冬天摆弄他那卡车了，我也应该给我找点事情干。$0#$e#没有农活可干，有些无聊呢。$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.034: 冰钓吗……$0#$e#呃，我不是很确定欸，也许老爸会喜欢？$5#$b#把鱼都关在冰下，再钓上来，感觉有点不是很厚道。$7
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.035: 嘿！你猜我在冬日星盛宴上许了什么愿？$1#$e#才不是什么再要一只小山羊呢，是和你在——一——起——再——一——次——度过开——心，快——乐，还有幸————福的一年啦笨————蛋！
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.036: 一年又到头了……$0#$e#你看，世间万物都有属于自己的季节，特别是在农场里，我们更能感受到时间一次又一次地转圈圈。$0#$e#哎呀，别听我这种哲学过头的发言，我只是脑子里想得太多，想发泄一下。$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.037: 嘿！今天过得怎么样？$1#$e#我在打扫卫生。$0#$e#*接吻* 哎呀，漏掉个地方没擦。$4
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.038: 工作间隙的话要记得休息一下。$5#$e#我不想你每天工作完都是筋疲力尽地回家。$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.039: 最近怎么样？$0#$e我在享受我自己独自度过的一天。$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.040: %斯嘉丽在哼歌。#$e#啦啦——哦，呃…啊…唔…嗯，呃，气氛好像有点，尴尬哈哈哈……$6#$e#, @，你什么都没听到！$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.041: 我早餐喜欢就吃剩菜剩饭，我总觉得不位于现在的味道会更好些。$0#$e#这些是剩下的！[240 426]$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.042: Mm, smell the sweetness of the fresh air?$1#$e#Nowhere else in the world is like the Valley. I don't gotta go everywhere to know that.$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.043: Farm's shapin' up into something special, huh?$0#$e#I love watchin' the way farms change over the seasons and the years.$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.044: D'you think that the same wildlife that live in the Valley always did, or have some animals come and gone over the years?$0#$e#I hear there's bears in the woods, but that's just a rumor. I think?$7
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.045: Mmm... I've got a big craving for fresh cherries. Just a big old handful of 'em.$0#$e#Too many'll give you a real upset stomach, though. Ask how I know.$7
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.046: The wind's playin' up real nice today.$0#$e#I like how it sounds in the trees around here.$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.047: Rainy days are so boooooring.$2#$e#They're good for the plants but not for me.$7
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.048: Wanna play a game inside till the weather clears up?$0#$e#You're busy? Awwww... even if I say please?$2#$e#Fine, fine. You go off bein' responsible. But you owe me a day, okay?$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.049: %Scarlett is tapping out a beat to the sound of the rain on her leg.#$e#Sometimes the rain patterin' on the roof sounds like somethin' you could make music to!$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.050: Ever just go out and let the rain fall on your face?$0#$e#I try it once in a while, but I don't like my hair gettin' all wet.$0#$e#I'd make a bad tree!$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.051: I miss goin' for drives with my dad in the rain.$5#$e#He'd always drive real careful, and it felt like we were all snug in our own little world...$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.052: Hungry? I sure am! That's why I went ahead and made dinner. Set the plates! [213 618 606 237 230 ]$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.053: Another busy day for you, huh?$0#$e#They say I give the best backrubs in the valley, wanna find out?$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.054: Your turn to give *me* a backrub, @.$0#$e#You'll never get good at it without practice!$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.055: Mmm... this house really is cozy, huh?$0#$e#I dunno how you made it feel so nice. Maybe it's just you.$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.056: Time to rest up, @! Worst part of bein' a farmer is that we miss out on a lot of the nightlife.$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.057: Funny how no matter where you are, the sound of rain is always the same.$0#$e#It used to put me right to sleep when I was a little girl.$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.058: Y'know, when I was young and they had to keep me busy when it was rainin', they just gave me crayons and paper and told me to go to town.$0#$e#Goats. Goats as far as the eye could see. Pink goats, green goats, goats with dots...$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.059: Sometimes Sophia lets me take home a few bottles of wine at the end of the season.$1#$b#Be real nice to open a bottle of red on a night like this...$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.060: You better make sure to cuddle me real close tonight. That rain's ridin' on a chilly wind.$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.061: The day after rain, the plants'll be all glowin' and green.$0#$e#It's something to look forward to. Happy plants make a happy farmer afterall!$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.062: Hey there. You know you're my favorite person?$0#$e#Yeah, that's right. Little ol' you.$4
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.063: Y'know, I've always felt like a little bit of a scatterbrained mess, but when I'm with you I can calm right down.#$e#No one else makes me feel that way.$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.064: Hmm... you know, you'd make a downright cute cosplayer.$0#$e#C'monnn, it'd be fun, right? Playin' dress up together. We could cosplay as one of my favorite couples!$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.065: Susan, Andy, Sophia... they've all made me feel at home in Pelican Town, but nobody's made me feel as welcome here as you do.$0#$e#Warm and fuzzy, that's how you make me feel.$4
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.066: We should go on a long drive, just you and me.$1#$e#Where to? Does it matter? Wherever it makes us happy to go.$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.067: I wanna make us a real fancy dinner sometime soon. We can grab some local meats and cheese and make ourselves a fancy charcuterie board.$0#$e#An excuse to eat goat cheese? Weeeell, maybe. But I wanna eat it with *you*!$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.068: Aw, @, y'know the way you look at me always makes me feel pretty?$4#$e#I haven't always felt the greatest about my looks...$7#$b#But you chase that all away.$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.069: So, what's the story? You look like you've got somethin' on your mind.$0#$e#Bet I can chase whatever it is away real fast if you bring your cheek over here.$4
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.070: I'm spendin' today thinking all about *you*!$1#$e#With the work I do, I've got a lot of time to think, you know.$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.071: Grampleton orange chicken for dinner tonight, just the way I like it!$1#$e#Promise or demand? You decide, you weirdo!$0#$e#Just kiddin'. You know I like cooking for ya.$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.072: How's your day going, @? Today's boring for me. Kinda the blah-blah-nothing-much sorta day.$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.073: 嗯哼……过两天我该回家探望一下我老爸了。$0#$e#当然啦，如果你想来，也可以和我一起。$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.074: You look nice today, @.$0#$e#It's hard stayin' looking nice on a farm!
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.075: You work really hard on the farm, huh?$0#$e#I guess we all do.$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.076: Another day in the life of me.$0#$e#I'm content enough, sure.$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.077: Dinner tonight?$0#$e#Sure, we can rustle somethin' up. You'll need to chop the vegetables, though.$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.078: @, did you bring me any goat milk, by some miraculous chance?$1
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.079: See anythin' interesting in the valley today, @?$0#$e#Just the same old for me, too.$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.080: I was a little worried about fittin' into this new life, but it's going well enough so far.$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.081: Wanna stop by the saloon soon, @?$1#$e#I feel like I don't see enough of the folks here who aren't workin' their farms.$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.082: %Scarlett seems lost in her thoughts and doesn't respond.
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.083: Not really in the mood to talk today, @. Gimme some space, please.$5
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.084: I oughta ask my dad if he ever goes through rough patches with Hank...$5#$e#Never you mind about that.$7
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.085: Ugh. You really think we have somethin' to say to each other right now?$3
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.086: I need to go talk to Sophia.$5#$e#No, you're not invited. It's a best friends-only talk.$7
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.087: Are you happy with how things are between us, @?$2#$e#It's certainly not what I imagined. I just... I don't know.$2#$e#%Scarlett is starting to tear up.
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.088: I guess as a little girl, you read all these stories that make marriage seem so romantic, like a fairy tale or somethin’.#$e#*Scarlett sighs.*
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.089: I won't be joinin' you for dinner tonight.$2#$e#Well, you can just find something to feed yourself.$3
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.090: Sometimes I miss Pondwood. A lot.$7#$e#I'd be somewhere very different if I'd made different choices...$7#$e#Well. Hey. I'm around if you want to talk. You don't have to be a genius to sense there's a rift between us...$5
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.091: I know things are bad when I prefer mulchin' the fields to your company...$7
Scarlett.funLeave.Spring.1: I'm off to Andy's!$1#$e#I'll tell him ya said hello.$0
Scarlett.funLeave.Spring.2: I'll just be to the south if ya need me, @!$0#$e#Aww, I'll miss you too. Bring me lunch, maybe?$4
Scarlett.funLeave.Spring.3: Time to buckle down and do some farmwork again!$0#$e#Nah, not here. I wish. I'm headin' to Andy's. Got a lot of farm work to do today.$0
Scarlett.funLeave.Spring.4: Andy's friendly, under all the... everything else.$5#$e#Nah, I swear! Heart of gold!$6#$b#When I get to his farm today I'll tell him he should show it to ya sometime.$1
Scarlett.funLeave.Spring.5: Headin' to Andy's again.$0#$e#I'm tryin' to wean him off the Joja stuff. It's going... well, it's going, that's for sure.$7
Scarlett.funLeave.Spring.6: Off to Andy's again! His fields are always bigger than I remembered.$0#$b#I hope you have a great day. Drop by and visit if you want!$0
Scarlett.funLeave.Spring.7: Springtime farmwork is some of the hardest, but I love seein' all the little green guys pokin' their heads up.$0#$e#You should come and see 'em soon! Andy doesn't mind visitors.$1
Scarlett.funLeave.Spring.8: I'm headin' out to Andy's farm now, but I won't be home too late.$0#$e#If I am, you just come right down there and pick me up! Sometimes I get distracted and don't notice the time.$0
Scarlett.funLeave.Spring.9: Hey, have you gone to see Andy's farm recently?$0#$e#It’s really shapin’ up. I'm helpin'!$1
Scarlett.funLeave.Spring.10: Seeds, seeds, where'd I put the seeds...$7#$e#I promised Andy I'd bring him some nice seeds today... Oh! Found 'em! Off I go!$1
Scarlett.funReturn.Spring.1: Another hard day of spring farmwork.$0#$e#I could eat a *cow*. Did you cook, by any chance?$0
Scarlett.funReturn.Spring.2: My work for the day just wrapped up! How about you, @?$0
Scarlett.funReturn.Spring.3: Andy gets a little... weird... about the other farmers.$7#$b#I'm glad the chip on his shoulder about them doesn't apply to me.$5
Scarlett.funReturn.Spring.4: Are you as hungry as I am, @?$0#$e#Not sure if I have the patience to make my famous Grampleton orange chicken tonight. I might just chow down on leftovers.$0
Scarlett.funReturn.Spring.5: Andy's nice enough, but he doesn't make the best conversationalist.$0#$e#You, on the other hand, are lovely to talk to. Wanna sit down and chat about our day?$1
Scarlett.funReturn.Spring.6: Ahh, workin' in the spring! Always leaves my shoulders aching.$0#$e#At least the spring is still cool. Summer heat'll come soon enough.$5
Scarlett.funReturn.Spring.7: Spring still gets a little chilly in the evening! I felt it walking home.$0#$e#Let's cuddle up real close tonight, okay?$4
Scarlett.funReturn.Spring.8: It's nice roundin' off a day of work with a trek back to the farm!$1#$e#Especially 'cause there's a nice warm farmhouse waiting for me with you in it.$0
Scarlett.funReturn.Spring.9: Today Andy went on a little... rant... that lasted most of the day.$7#$e#I dunno what it was about, I tuned out after the second or third complaint about Pierre's prices.$5
Scarlett.funReturn.Spring.10: Did you take some time to have a little bit of fun today, @?$1#$e#It's still important to have fun, even when there's lots of hard work to be done.$0
Scarlett.MarriageDialogue.Summer_8: It's Susan season!$1#$e#She's nicer than Andy, but still works me just as hard. I bet I'll need a backrub tonight, so put one on preorder for me!$0
Scarlett.funLeave.Summer.1: Melons, melons... they're good enough, but I don't understand why Susan loves 'em so much over other fruit.$0#$e#Ah well. Off I go to the melon mines, I guess.$1
Scarlett.funLeave.Summer.2: Ugh... it's nice enough now, but by the time I get to Emerald Farm, the sun's gonna be swelterin'.$5#$e#Sorry that I get home a little sweaty in the summer. Nothin' to be done about it.$0
Scarlett.funLeave.Summer.3: I'm headed off to Susan's! I hope she tells me one of her travel stories today.$0#$e#She's seen more than I ever will. I don't mind too much, though.$0
Scarlett.funLeave.Summer.4: Well, I have a lot of work to get done today up at the railroad! You know where to find me.$0#$e#You should come say hi if you have a spare moment today!$1
Scarlett.funLeave.Summer.5: Sometimes Susan keeps a fresh, cool glass of goat milk waitin' for me.$1#$e#Really gives the motivation to climb up there, lemme tell you.$0
Scarlett.funLeave.Summer.6: I'm off to Emerald Farm! I'll be heading out here soon. Have a nice day, alright?$0?
Scarlett.funLeave.Summer.7: I have a bunch of crops to tend to today at Emerald Farm. They're almost ready for harvest.#$e#I'll see if I can pick something up on my way back for dinner.$1
Scarlett.funLeave.Summer.8: Have you visited Susan's farm lately?$0#$e#You could walk me up there. It could be cute to go together!$1
Scarlett.funLeave.Summer.9: Man... my legs are sore this morning. Why's Susan's farm gotta be all the way up in the mountains?$2#$e#Eh, I shouldn't complain. She's a good boss.$0
Scarlett.funLeave.Summer.10: *giggle* The smell must've woke you up, huh? I made us a feast for breakfast![201]$1#$e#I need to pound a bunch of early calories. I got my work cut out for me today.$0
Scarlett.funReturn.Summer.1: Hey, how was your day?$0#$e#I'm still sweaty from workin' at Emerald Farm today. Gonna hop in the shower here in a sec.$0
Scarlett.funReturn.Summer.2: Walkin' home from Susan's in the summer really feels like cooling down from a workout.$0#$e#Those melons don’t pick themselves!$1
Scarlett.funReturn.Summer.3: At least walkin' home in the evening isn't as hot as bein' out in the sun all day.$5#$e#I really gotta remember to wear sunscreen, or I'm gonna shrivel up like a raisin.$7
Scarlett.funReturn.Summer.4: Ahhh, another summer's day of work in the Valley. It may be hot, but I still love it.$1#$e#The farm's really shapin' up!$0
Scarlett.funReturn.Summer.5: Did you get lots of work done today, @?$1#$e#You better not have been lazin' around while I worked my tail off!$1
Scarlett.funReturn.Summer.6: Thank goodness today is over.$5#$e#Let's just sit inside. In the nice, cool farmhouse. Maybe with a cold drink.$0
Scarlett.funReturn.Summer.7: I gotta admit, knowin' you're waiting at the end of my day makes it easier to get through even the hottest summer work.$0
Scarlett.funReturn.Summer.8: Best part of my dad's truck? The air conditioning...$7#$e#Do you think we could turn the AC up a little bit?$0
Scarlett.funReturn.Summer.9: I messed up a few times today, and Susan was way nicer than most people woulda been.$0#$e#I'm gonna bake her a cake, I think.$1
Scarlett.funReturn.Summer.10: I watered Susan's houseplants today, that's why I'm a little bit late gettin' home.$0#$e#It's not part of my normal work, but they were droopin' a little. Plants are always thirstier in the summer.$0
Scarlett.funLeave.Fall.1: I'm headin' off to Blue Moon Vineyard for work today.$0
Scarlett.funLeave.Fall.2: Time for me to go to Sophia's! Grapes get picked faster when you're talkin' to friends while you do it.$0
Scarlett.funLeave.Fall.3: Hey, I'm workin' at the vineyard today. I have a lot of work to do.$0
Scarlett.funLeave.Fall.4: Fall is a whole lot of harvesting, but since the heat goes down it's easier to deal with.$0#$e#I'm headed to Sophia's soon, but bring your cheek here for a kiss first!$1
Scarlett.funLeave.Fall.5: So many grapes to pick today. I got my work cut out for me.$7#$e#Hey, have a nice day!$0
Scarlett.funLeave.Fall.6: If I say pretty please before I leave, will you have some dinner waitin' for me when I get home tonight?$0#$e#Pretty-*pretty*-please?$1
Scarlett.funLeave.Fall.7: We still have a lotta grapes to pick this season!$0#$e#Don't worry, I won't be home too late. I don't like walkin' all the way from Sophia's in the dark.$0
Scarlett.funLeave.Fall.8: I'm about to head to the vineyard!#$e#It's gonna be a real good crop year this season, I can feel it in my bones.$0
Scarlett.funLeave.Fall.9: D'you like blackberries more than salmonberries?$0#$e#I think the salmonberries taste a little funny. And blackberry wine is delicious.$1#$b#I'm gonna pick some blackberries on the way to work today!$0
Scarlett.funLeave.Fall.10: I'm off to Sophia's! Goin' there doesn't always feel like work.$0#$e#Sometimes we just hang out and talk. And maybe watch some TV!$1
Scarlett.funReturn.Fall.1: Now that my work is done today, I can focus on *you*!$1#$e#In the good way! Don't look so nervous!$0
Scarlett.funReturn.Fall.2: Ooh... feel that autumn chill in the air?#$e#I forgot my coat today. I really felt that walk home!
Scarlett.funReturn.Fall.3: Sophia was rougher on me than usual today.$2#$e#Ehh, I think she was just feelin' bad about something else. It's tough when you're friends with your boss, though.$0
Scarlett.funReturn.Fall.4: I love farmwork, but this year I'm gonna be a little bit happy when winter rolls around.$5#$e#Just a tiny bit. The days have been hard and I wanna be lazy for a while.$0
Scarlett.funReturn.Fall.5: I oughta go visit my dad soon...$0#$e#Ughh, but not tonight. I'm sore. Backrub?$0
Scarlett.funReturn.Fall.6: Work wasn't so bad today!$1#$e#Sophia had a new cosplay idea and we chatted about it for almost the whole afternoon. Makes the work go a lot faster.$0
Scarlett.funReturn.Fall.7: Evening, you!$1#$b#Sophia told me to tell you hello. You should stop by her vineyard sometime soon!$0
Scarlett.funReturn.Fall.8: Walkin' home in the autumn when it starts getting dark, I worry I might see some ghosts pop out of the shadows.$7#$e#You better not prank me, @!$3
Scarlett.funReturn.Fall.9: Whew, Sophia might be my friend, but workin' in the vineyards is no joke.$0#$e#I dunno how long I'm gonna be able to keep my eyes open after dinner. Get your cuddle time in while you can!$1
Scarlett.funReturn.Fall.10: It got really cold in the vineyard for the last few hours of work.$0#$e#Do we have any apple cider? I want hot apple cider!$1
Scarlett.FairhavenFarm.Marriage.00: Aw, you're so sweet to drop by while I'm workin' Andy's fields. This is why you're the best!$1
Scarlett.FairhavenFarm.Marriage.01: Thanks for checking in on me. I'll see you later tonight, alright?$0
Scarlett.FairhavenFarm.Marriage.02: Look at all these little happy green guys! They are my responsibility, ya know?$0
Scarlett.FairhavenFarm.Marriage.03: I love it when you visit me at work. It motivates me to push myself a little harder.$0
Scarlett.FairhavenFarm.Marriage.04: At least the spring is still cool. Summer heat'll come soon enough so I gotta enjoy this nice weather while I can.$0
Scarlett.FairhavenFarm.Marriage.05: I'm happy you stopped by to visit! I'd ask you to help but then I would be out of a job!$1#$b#Well, I gotta get back to it.$0
Scarlett.FairhavenFarm.Marriage.06: Andy is super strong! He carried four bags of fertilizer all at once.$0
Scarlett.FairhavenFarm.Marriage.07: It's a little tempting to visit Sophia right now. She's just right up that cliff.$0
Scarlett.FairhavenFarm.Marriage.08: Is it true Andy's house got refurbished? I wonder what it looked like before...$0
Scarlett.FairhavenFarm.Marriage.09: I've seen a bunch of families of crows nestin' in the trees eyein' up Fairhaven Farm.$0#$b#Good thing there's a scarecrow. But I don't know if one is enough...$7
Scarlett.FairhavenFarm.Marriage.10: Andy's farm may be smaller than others in the valley but I'd say it has the most character!$0
Scarlett.EmeraldFarm.Marriage.00: Trekkin' up to Emerald Farm is always a workout.$0
Scarlett.EmeraldFarm.Marriage.01: If you're here does that mean you brought me some lunch?$0
Scarlett.EmeraldFarm.Marriage.02: I like seeing the different trains come and go while I'm workin' here. Some of them have... interesting art on the cars.$0
Scarlett.EmeraldFarm.Marriage.03: *phew* I have a lot of work to get done today... and this summer heat isn't helpin'!$2
Scarlett.EmeraldFarm.Marriage.04: Sometimes Susan keeps a fresh, cool glass of goat milk waitin' for me.$0#$b#Really gives the motivation to climb up here, lemme tell you!$1
Scarlett.EmeraldFarm.Marriage.05: Susan always makes fresh lemonade after a hard days work!$1
Scarlett.EmeraldFarm.Marriage.06: I might use the bathhouse after I'm done today. I'm working up a sweat!$1
Scarlett.EmeraldFarm.Marriage.07: *sniff* *sniff* Smell that!? This fertilizer has a pungent scent!!!$6
Scarlett.EmeraldFarm.Marriage.08: You walked all the way up here just to see me? Just when I thought my day couldn't get better!$1
Scarlett.EmeraldFarm.Marriage.09: Funny, I was just thinkin' about you... and here you are!$1
Scarlett.EmeraldFarm.Marriage.10: Ahhh, another summer's day of work in the Valley. I'm definitely taking a shower tonight.$0
Scarlett.BlueMoonVineyard.Marriage.00: %Scarlett is whistling and smiles at you while she works
Scarlett.BlueMoonVineyard.Marriage.01: Sophia and I are in the middle of talkin' about her new outfit debut. It's gonna be so cool!$0
Scarlett.BlueMoonVineyard.Marriage.02: These grapes won't turn themselves into wine!$0
Scarlett.BlueMoonVineyard.Marriage.03: Do you remember when we borrowed your feet for the grape squishing? We might need to borrow them again soon.$1
Scarlett.BlueMoonVineyard.Marriage.04: Don't distract me! I got a lot to get done today.$1
Scarlett.BlueMoonVineyard.Marriage.05: The ocean breeze up here can get really chilly. I wouldn't object to a quick emergency cuddle for warmth!$1
Scarlett.BlueMoonVineyard.Marriage.06: Aw, it's so nice of you to visit me at work. Don't forget to say hi to Sophia, too!$0
Scarlett.BlueMoonVineyard.Marriage.07: Funny you showed up! Sophia and I were just talkin' about you.$1#$e#Can't tell you! my lips are sealed!$1
Scarlett.BlueMoonVineyard.Marriage.08: If you're here does that mean you brought me some lunch?$1
Scarlett.BlueMoonVineyard.Marriage.09: Have you also noticed all the bunnies that live around the vineyard?$0
Scarlett.BlueMoonVineyard.Marriage.10: Oh, hey! Thanks for checkin' on me. I should try doin' the same to you sometime...$4
Scarlett.BlueMoonVineyard.Marriage.11: I love the view of the Gem Sea here! But I guess you're also nice, too.$1
Scarlett.BlueMoonVineyard.Marriage.12: This next batch of wine is going to be a good one. I can just feel it!$0
Scarlett.BlueMoonVineyard.Marriage.13: I'm happy you stopped by to visit! I'd ask you to help but then I would be out of a job!$1#$b#Well, I gotta get back to it.$0
Scarlett.BlueMoonVineyard.Marriage.14: If I say pretty please before I leave, will you have some dinner waitin' for me when I get home tonight?$0#$b#Pretty-*pretty*-please?$1
Scarlett.BlueMoonVineyard.Marriage.15: Did you take time off to visit me at work? This is why you're the best!$1
Scarlett.BlueMoonVineyard.Marriage.16: Hey! Did you want to walk back home together? I'm wrappin' up soon.$0
Scarlett.10hearts.01: Hey, morning. I was wondering if you'd be up for a hike today? I know a great trail near my neighborhood.$0
Scarlett.10hearts.02: Awesome! Drop by my house this afternoon in Grampleton. I hope the nice weather holds up!$1
Scarlett.10hearts.03: I have to finish up some work and then I'll meet you at my house, okay?$0#$e#See you soon!$1
Scarlett.10hearts.04: Hey, you made it! I brought some snacks for us in case we get hungry.$1#$b#We head down this way and hook a left out of the suburbs. Follow me!$0
Scarlett.10hearts.05: This is why they call it 'Pondwood'!
Scarlett.10hearts.06: We head off the path here.
Scarlett.10hearts.08: Let me check the ladder first.
Scarlett.10hearts.09: Alright, you're good to come up!$1
Scarlett.10hearts.10: This place is a wreck. It's been years since I came here last.$2#$b#We shouldn't go inside... it seems too dangerous, even for me. We're safer out here.$7
Scarlett.10hearts.11: I'm not sure who built this tree house. I found it a long time ago while exploring and it was abandoned.$5#$b#I used to hang out here by myself all the time. So having some good company is nice for a change.$0
Scarlett.10hearts.12: *giggle* How did that one song go?... @ and Scarlett Sitting in a tree... K-I-S-S-I-N-G!$1
Scarlett.10hearts.13: That was a fun hike. We should do it again sometime!$0#$e#Imagine if we fixed up the treehouse. You're good at that kind of stuff, right?$1
Scarlett.14hearts.1: Welcome home! I hope you brought a big appetite. I just finished dinner.$1
Scarlett.14hearts.2: You ate the whole plate in one bite!? Did you even taste any of that?$6
Scarlett.14hearts.3: Well, anyway...$7#$b#I want to take a day trip with you and drive us over to a place called 'Go Goat Ranch' in Grampleton.$0#$b#It's a famous ranch with the coolest and cutest goats ever. I've always wanted to visit! How does that sound to you?$1
Scarlett.14hearts.4: You're the best! If the weather's good tomorrow, we'll borrow my dad's truck back home in the suburbs. And if it doesn't hold up, we'll just wait for the next nice day.$0
Scarlett.14hearts.5: Apparently there's a goat that lives on an island at 'Go Goat Ranch'.$0#$e#When the weather is nice let's go visit! We'll start our road trip at my dads'.
Scarlett.14hearts.6: Thanks for letting us borrow your truck, papa! I won't get a scratch on it!$1
Scarlett.14hearts.7: Treyvon: Haha, alright! You two have a safe trip. Please drive safely, honey.
Scarlett.14hearts.9: Wake up you sleepy head. We're here!$1
Scarlett.14hearts.10: Go Goat Ranch is even better in person. I'm so happy to be here with you!$1
Scarlett.14hearts.11: Wait, is that who I think it is!?$0
Scarlett.14hearts.14: Alright, this is the main grazing area. I'm on a mission to find the cutest goat and give them a treat!$1#$b#Let's go over here. Follow me!$0
Scarlett.14hearts.15: Shhh... they're sleeping.$1#$b#Let's find other goats who aren't taking an afternoon nap.$0
Scarlett.14hearts.16: *gasp* This goat is the one! Hey, little fella...$1
Scarlett.14hearts.17: *giggle* Well, I'm totally 'goated' out!$1#$b#I had a lot of fun. Let's head home.$0
Scarlett.14hearts.18: If I could get away with it... I would have ran away with that baby goat.$0#$e#Oh, here's a large goat milk. They were handing them out at the ranch. I already drank mine![438]$0
Scarlett.Egg: Hey, did you see that there's goat milk? Someone must've read my mind!$1
Scarlett.Egg2: You think they ever forget to pick up some of the eggs? It'd put up a mighty stink in a month or so.
Scarlett.Flower: I wish it smelled this good all year long!$0
Scarlett.Flower2: The little flower crowns people wear here sometimes are so darn cute.$1#$e#Maybe I'll make one for myself later.
Scarlett.Luau: Did you eat any of the Grampleton orange chicken I brought?$0#$e#Sophia may have eaten it all already!$1
Scarlett.Luau2: Mmm, it's nice to have someone else do the cooking for me for once!
Scarlett.Jellyfish: The dock got kinda crowded so we're just hangin' back here on the beach.$0
Scarlett.Jellyfish2: I love watchin' these little guys twinkling in the sea.$1#$e#They pass by Grampleton too, but I think the Valley gets more here.$0
Scarlett.Fair: Sophia number one! You can win this!$1#$e#Hey, @! I lent Sophia a hand with setting up her grange display today.#$e#You're in for some tough competition this year!$1
Scarlett.Fair2: Of course you know I hafta root for Sophia over you. Nothing personal!
Scarlett.Spirit: The Valley's spirits eve festival is really cool!#$e#Our wizard who resides in Grampleton Fields makes a maze for us too.$0#$b#Maybe next year you can visit with Sophia?$1
Scarlett.Halloween2: 今年的迷宫太难了！$1#$e#为了成功也许我可以当一次跟屁虫……？
Scarlett.Ice: I bet this place makes for a great camping spot durin' the summer.$1#$e#With its beautiful surroundings and pleasant weather... it would be perfect for setting up a tent!$0
Scarlett.Ice2: Brrr...you aren't too cold for fishing, @?$1#$e#I feel like my hands are so numb I'd drop the fishing rod.
Scarlett.Christmas: I'm waiting for my turn to pet the dog.$0
Scarlett.Christmas2: This present has my name on it!$1
Summit.Dialogue.Scarlett.01: It was really hard for me to move out of my ol' dad's house back in Grampleton... but I'm glad I did.$0#$b#Every day of my life since then has been a wild adventure.$1
Summit.Dialogue.Scarlett.02: Honestly, this all feels like a dream come true. And right now... I just want to hold you tight and enjoy this view together.$4
Sophia.MarriedScarlett: 我还记得你和斯嘉丽相遇的那一天。你们两个现在结婚了，太疯狂了！$9#$e#我真的为你们俩感到高兴。$1
Sophia.DivorcedScarlett: 嘿……你和斯嘉丽之间发生了什么？$2#$e#希望这不会让我们的友谊变得尴尬……$2
Treyvon.MarriedScarlett: %Treyvon: I love my little girl, @. Please take good care of her. You two are partners tackling life together now.#$e#%Treyvon: *sigh* I gotta say... this place sure is more quiet without her here.
Treyvon.DivorcedScarlett: %Treyvon: Hey. I don't think it's a good idea for you to linger around here anymore.#$e#%Treyvon: Scarlett took the divorce really hard, @. Sorry. But you need to leave.
Hank.MarriedScarlett: %Hank: Congratulations again, @. I wish you and Scarlett a happy life together.#$e#%Hank: ... I caught Treyvon crying in the garage earlier. He is so happy for you two but it takes a toll on a father.
Hank.DivorcedScarlett: %Hank: I don't think this house will ever be the same now.#$e#%Hank: I don't believe it is wise for you to stick around.
Scarlett.Divorced: I thought we agreed we wouldn't talk to each other anymore?$2#$e#%Scarlett looks away from you.
CommunityDay.Dialogue.224: I tried inviting my dads, but they were super invested in the Tunnelers game. Maybe next time!$1
CommunityDay.Dialogue.225: You should introduce me to some of the folks here sometime. I still don't know most of 'em here!$1
CommunityDay.Dialogue.226: The Grampleton chicken poppers I brought today are a huge hit. I just hope Sophia saves some for everyone else.$1
CommunityDay.Dialogue.227: I'm glad to be part of this community with you...$4
Scarlett.Engagement.1: Hard to believe this isn't some kind of dream. I need to take some deep breathes!$4
Scarlett.Engagement.2: I know I live far away... but I won't let that affect the connection we have.$0
Phone.Sophia: Hey you! Did you watch the recent episode of Pink Princess Crusaders? I can't believe what happened - it changes everything!$1#$e#Anyway, I gotta go re-watch the episode to make sure I didn't miss anything. Bye! *click*$9
Phone.Morgan: *giggle* H-hey... Hey! @! It's me, Morgan! I'm calling you from a crystal ball. Isn't that cool!?#$e#Oh, I gotta go. Magnus is coming. Bye!$1 *thump*
Phone.Haley: Oh. My. God. Stacie, did you hear what Brad did? It's unforgivable. He's totally on my 'do not talk to list' now.$3#$b#... Wait. @? Is that you? Oh no... wrong number!$12#$b#Forget you heard anything... *click*$3
Phone.Camilla: Hello dear, you must be surprised to hear my voice. We may not have phones in Castle Village, but we do have crystal balls for communication.$1#$b#The crimson sands are calling for your aid, @. You're certainly one of a kind...*thump*$0
Phone.Andy: 你好，农场主。你最近有在忙活吗？种地的生活可不像过家家那样儿戏。不过你也得适当休息一下，别累着你自己。$0#$b#别怕身上沾点儿土，这可是勤奋农民的象征！*挂断*$1
Phone.Susan: Hi honey! I have to say, this is much easier than sending you a letter in the mail!#$b#I just wanted to call and check on you. You work so hard every day, so make sure to take breaks often and stay hydrated.$0#$b#Take care of yourself, alright? Visit me soon! *click*$1
Phone.Olivia: @, darling! I was pleasantly surprised to hear you have a phone!! Life at home changes once you have a way to communicate with your friends.$0#$e#Don't be a stranger now, dear. My doors are always open to you. *click*$6
Phone.Victor: @! I just finished reading an epic adventurer tale from a far away land and it reminded me of you!$1#$b#You're one of the bravest people I know. Stay safe out there! *click*$3
Phone.Morris: Ah yes, @! Hello! I'm calling to inform you that you've been recognized by the higher ups at Joja HQ!$1#$b#You've done exceptional work to pave a way for a greater Stardew Valley.$0#$b#Continue to perform like this and you will be rewarded!... and so will I! Haha! *click*$5
Phone.Leah: 嗨，@！你知道吗，春天的 15 日到 18 日可是采集的最好时机哦。你可在整个煤矿森林里看到很多美味多汁的成熟浆果。$0#$b#说不定还能在瀑布旁边看到彩虹呢！$1#$b#就这样吧，我先挂了，再见！*啪嗒*$7
Phone.Alex: Hi, @. I just finished eating a dozen eggs and I still want more!$0#$b#If you're raising chickens at %farm, I wouldn't mind taking some eggs off your hands!$1#$e#Well, gotta go. Cya! *click*$0
Phone.Lance: Greetings, @. The life of an adventurer can be thrilling and eye opening, but also dangerous.#$b#Always be aware of your surroundings and come prepared. I wish you the best. *thump*
Phone.Leo: *sqwak* Whoa... it worked! My parrot family said I could talk to you with this thing and they were right!$3#$b#This is great. I don't know what we should do now so...$0#$b#*sqwak* Maybe I will call you again later and we can talk about golden walnuts! *click*$1
Phone.Evelyn: Hello, dear. It's very kind you take time out of your busy days to visit my grandson, George and I.$0#$b#Feel free to drop by anytime. You might even find a batch of fresh cookies waiting just for you!$1#$b#I hope you have a wonderful day, @. Goodbye. *click*$0
Henchman.Gifts.Liked: Hmm... this is nice. I'll find a spot for it in my home.$0
Henchman.Gifts.Disliked: What am I supposed to do with this, human?...$2
Henchman.Gifts.StardropTea: Stardrop Tea!? Gimme it now!$1#$b#*slurp*... *slurp*...$0#$b#It's tasty! Very very TASTY!!$1
Henchman.Gifts.VoidDelight: I could smell this delightful void dish on you hoping you'd give it to me!... I can't resist! *munch* *munch*$1
Henchman.Gifts.VoidShard: A powerful foreign stone!?... I know of someone who'll appreciate this. Thanks!$1
Henchman.Gifts.VoidMayo: Void Mayonnaise!? You spoil me, human! *munch* *munch*$1
Henchman.Gifts.MarshTonic: *sniff*... Gweee!! Good job brewing this tonic! I'll take it now.$1
Henchman.Dialogue.BeforeHomeRepaired: I don't want to sleep on the dirt anymore...$2
Henchman.Dialogue.1: Hello, human. Did you bring me gifts?$0
Henchman.Dialogue.2: This home may not be much, but it's mine.$0#$e#For dinner... mushroom soup and mashed swamp flower!! Gwee!$1
Henchman.Dialogue.3: My cousin lives in a far away place called 'Castle Village'. His name is Gribble.$0#$e#He works for a witch too. I believe her name is... Camika? Camalla? Camina?... I forget.$0
Henchman.Dialogue.4: *sniff*... *sniff*... You have a unique scent. It tells many stories.$0
Henchman.Dialogue.5: *snarl* Leave some swamp forage for me! Don't take it all!$1
Henchman.Dialogue.6: All kinds of mushrooms call the marshlands their home... They're great potion ingredients!$0#$e#I make good money on the side! Gwahahaha!$1
Henchman.Dialogue.7: Sorry about the threats. I didn't know how else to get you to help me.$0#$e#I don't have any friends.$0
Henchman.Dialogue.8: My former master provided a good benefits package...$2
Henchman.Dialogue.9: I try reading every day. One year I'll finish the red book I 'borrowed'.$0#$e#Humans read, right? Got any pointers?$0
Henchman.Dialogue.10: You must be strong to survive the marshlands. Monsters don't like your kind.$0#$e#Oh, me? They leave me alone. It's nice.$0
Henchman.Dialogue.11: What business does a human have here anyway? Dangerous place the marshlands are...$0
Henchman.Dialogue.12: I hope you find the dark shrines useful... go cause trouble! Gwee!$1
Henchman.Dialogue.13: I miss my old job.$2#$e#I need to think of a good idea to get it back.$0
Henchman.Dialogue.14: You are a strange human. Your gifts make me judge you differently.$0#$e#I will do something nice for you someday.$0
Henchman.Dialogue.15: One day I will leave this place to practice magic.$0#$e#Need more money first!$1
Henchman.Dialogue.16: *slurp*...*slurp*...*crunch*...$1#$e#%He's busy eating void mayonnaise while awkwardly making eye contact.
Henchman.Dialogue.17: Several jars of void mayonnaise are under my bed - always there incase I need a midnight snack.$0#$e#They aren't for sale! Gwee!!!$1
Henchman.Dialogue.18: You have been a good friend. Here... take some of my precious! [308]
Henchman.Dialogue.19: I was prepared to move on from my home, but you helped save it. Thanks.$0#$e#If it didn't work out... I'd move in with my cousin.
Henchman.Dialogue.20: Many strange structures around here. Remnants of an old civilization...$0#$e#I hope they liked roasted alligator as much as I do!$1
Henchman.Event.Death2: Henchman saved me and didn't ask for anything in return...
Henchman.Questline.02: The Henchman lost his home and job because of me. To please the witch, I must venture into the Marshlands and collect potion ingredients.
Henchman.Questline.03: Drop off 50 swamp flowers to Henchman's home.
Henchman.Questline.04: Drop off 12 red mushrooms to Henchman's home.
Henchman.Questline.05: Drop off 12 purple mushrooms to Henchman's home.
Henchman.Questline.06: Drop off 12 morels to Henchman's home.
Henchman.Questline.07: Drop off 12 chanterelles to Henchman's home.
Henchman.Event.02: You're much quieter than you appear. I didn't expect you'd actually show up.$0
Henchman.Event.03: My boss was furious that I allowed you into her home. I took all the blame for that stolen ink...$2#$b#And now... I sleep on the dirt...$2
Henchman.Event.04: You will help me get my house and job back...$0#$b#Or else my friends will pay %farm a... what you humans call... a 'visit'.$1
Henchman.Event.05: I need dozens of different mushrooms found here and a large basket of swamp flowers. I'll give you a list.$0#$b#I'm gonna offer these to show my loyalty and get my job and house back! Gwee!$1
Henchman.Event.06: Huh. So this is what your place looks like. It's too colorful. Hurts the eyes...$0#$b#Anyway. I just wanted to say thanks for helping me with my home.$0
Henchman.Event.07: I didn't get my job back, so I suppose I need to come up with another way to prove my loyalty...$2
Henchman.Event.08: Well, don't be a stranger. The land bridge to my home isn't underwater anymore.$0#$b#Visit me sometime with more delicious void mayonnaise! Gwee!$1
Henchman.Event.10: Ah, human! Welcome to my humble home. I was just eating food in my special corner.$0
Henchman.Event.11: Say, you look famished. I'll fix something up for you!$1
Henchman.Event.12: I made you one of my favorites... 'void mayo sandwich'!$0
Henchman.Event.15: Oh, yeah. I forget humans can't eat this stuff. I bet some 'void swamp tea' will help wash that down.$0
Henchman.Event.16: *snarl* GWAAAAHAA!! No! Not on my floor!$2
Henchman.Event.17: That's the last void mayo sandwich I give to you.$2#$e#I do appreciate you stuck around to help... clean up.$0
Henchman.Event.18: Sorry about the whole poisoning thing from before... As an apology, I will teach you how to brew a new elixir. This one is edible. Promise!$0#$b#Follow me inside... Gwee!$1
Henchman.Event.19: Look closely. This is the only potion I know how to make. It provides great buffs for adventurers.$0
Henchman.Event.20: First, add a bunch of slimey goo. You can't find them here so you gotta go somewhere else. Gwee!$1
Henchman.Event.21: Then trim the swamp flower petals like this.$0
Henchman.Event.22: Gwee! Now take the swamp essence and SMASH them with a HAMMER!!!$1
Henchman.Event.23: Sometimes there's a stubborn one. Poor fellow.$0#$b#SMASH IT HARDER!!!$1
Henchman.Event.26: Learned how to brew a 'Marsh Tonic'
Henchman.Event.27: These potions aren't licensed by the ministry so... don't tell anyone about this, alright?$0
Henchman.Event.28: Without sugar, you wouldn't be able to drink the 'marsh tonic'. You'd just make another mess on my floor.$0
Henchman.Event.29: Thanks, human. You have a kind heart.$0
Henchman.Event.30: ...Yes. It's not the smartest thing I've done. I was just curious about potion brewing. I should've asked first.$2
Henchman.Event.31: Perhaps you have a point. It isn't good to dawdle on the past...$2
Henchman.Event.32: $q -1 null#(What should I say?)#$r -1 0 henchman_event1#I hope you get your job back in the future.#$r -1 0 henchman_event2#You stole books from your employer?#$r -1 0 henchman_event3#Maybe it's time to move on.
Henchman.Event.33: Hello, human. I'm gathering swamp flowers. This spot always has the best ones.$0
Henchman.Event.34: Life has been challenging since I lost my job. Now, I make a living foraging in the Marshlands. It doesn't bring in much coin but I can make ends meet.$0
Henchman.Event.35: *sigh*... I blamed you for my firing, but it's really my own fault. I've made a lot of mistakes while on the job, and I guess it all finally caught up with me..$2#$b#I don't deserve to be a witch's henchman.$2
Henchman.Event.36: If I ever get my job back, I promise to be a better employee. I won't accept bribes, be late, leave early, slack off, or steal....$2#$b#Sometimes I 'borrowed' books from work and never returned them. I still have the red one.$0
Henchman.Event.37: I'm glad to call you a friend. I don't have conversation with anyone, except for my cousin but it isn't often. It gets lonely out here.$0
Henchman.Event.38: Gwee! The locals tracked your scent! You must run, human!$1
Henchman.Event.39: Guess it's time to get back to work. And for dinner tonight? Mushroom soup, if I can find more chanterelles and morels!$0#$b#Or maybe alligator jerky if I manage to catch one!$1
Henchman.Event.40: Hey, friend. Want to help me forage the rest of these flowers? You'd help me make a living so I can eat.$0
Henchman.Event.41: Creatures of the Marshlands don't harm me, but they also won't help out. I suppose you could say we have a 'mutual understanding'. Gwee.$0#$e#Thank you for checking in on me there while I was foraging and letting me express my feelings. Even though I'm a goblin, your compassion shows.$0
Henchman.Event.42: Gwee! Your farmland is nicer on the eyes under the cloak of night.$0#$b#I was almost caught by this human wearing leaves for clothes on my way here, but I hid in the shadows!$1
Henchman.Event.43: Anyway, I am here to tell you that I finally finished my tribute to my former employer. It only took a month of hard work and my life savings.$0#$b#Visit my home in the Marshlands tomorrow so I may show you!!!$1
Henchman.Event.44: Yes, you're here! Gwee!$1#$b#There's a new pathway behind my house. Follow me.$0
Henchman.Event.45: Well, what do you think? I summoned new dark shrines using knowledge I learned from the red book.$0#$b#... There were also strange voices in my head telling me what to do. But that isn't important.$0
Henchman.Event.46: If you bring the correct offerings to the shrines... weird things can happen!$1#$b#I'm hoping this tribute will prove to my former employer that I-
Henchman.Event.47: Gwee! I gotta go! Outta the way, human!$1
Henchman.Event.48: There's five new dark shrines, but is it a good idea to interact with them?...
Henchman.Event.49: I got my job back and you have new dark shrines to cause chaos with. This couldn't have turned out better.$0#$e#I had to return the red book. I'll be a better employee starting... now! I won't take this second chance for granted.$0
Henchman.Event.50: Hello, human. If you wish to pass, you gotta pay the price: one jar of your finest void mayonnaise...$0
Henchman.Event.51: Gwahahaha! I jest! I don't take bribes anymore. I am a changed goblin!$1#$b#I'm not allowed to let anyone through here, but my boss has made an exception for you. That could be either a good thing or a bad thing.
Henchman.Event.53: Don't be a stranger, @. I can always use the company and you know where to find me. The Marshlands will always welcome you. Gwee!$0
Henchman.Event.54: It seems my boss has taken an interest in you.$0#$e#Oh, why? I can't tell you. I have orders to follow! Wouldn't want to be out of the job again.$0
DarkShrine.Money.01: -Dark Shrine of Money-^Offer 20 supernatural goo in exchange for 1 tree coin, which grows into a money tree.
DarkShrine.Money.02: -Dark Shrine of Money-^Offer 20 supernatural goo in exchange for 1 tree coin, which grows into a money tree.
DarkShrine.Life.01: -Dark Shrine of Life-^Offer 15 sludge in exchange for 1 life elixir.
DarkShrine.Life.02: -Dark Shrine of Life-^Offer 15 sludge in exchange for 1 life elixir.
DarkShrine.Invasion.01: -Dark Shrine of Invasion-^Armies of monsters invade the valley at night...^Make an offering of one Ornate Treasure Chest?
DarkShrine.Moss.01: -Dark Shrine of Moss-^Removes and prevents moss from growing on all trees in the entire world.^Make an offering of one Gold Carrot?

Lance.14HeartEvent.01: Hello, my love. Come join me on the shore.$1
Lance.14HeartEvent.02: There's an island not far from here that's home to dinosaurs. Have you ever been there?$0
Lance.14HeartEvent.03: *chuckle* I can already feel your anticipation for adventure.$5#$b#Hold onto me, and I shall take us there.$1
Lance.14HeartEvent.04: The inhabitants of this island are peaceful and will pose no threat to us.$0#$b#However, it might be best to avoid that one.$6
Lance.14HeartEvent.05: I want this to be your journey! Lead the way.$1
Lance.14HeartEvent.06: Ah... now this scene brings back memories of when I first laid my eyes on you.$5
Lance.14HeartEvent.07: Is it just me, or is it getting hot in here?...$4
Lance.14HeartEvent.08: *chuckle* I wonder what other adventures await us in the future.$5
Sebastian.Event.02: Hey @! We're about to have dinner.$0#$b#Why don't you join us?$0
Sebastian.Event.04: Honey, can you go grab Sebastian downstairs?$5#$b#He needs to join the family tonight at the table. No excuses.$6
Sebastian.Event.05: I'll try my best to persuade him, but no promises.$3
Sebastian.Event.07: It's just me! Dinner is ready upstairs. We're having tacos tonight.$0
Sebastian.Event.08: Cool. I'll be up later to grab some food.$0
Sebastian.Event.09: Your room has changed since I was last down here. Is that rug over there new?$1
Sebastian.Event.10: Didn't you see the 'Do Not Enter' sign on my door?$0
Sebastian.Event.11: Come on now. You don't need to be like that...$5#$b#Join us upstairs at the kitchen table.$0
Sebastian.Event.12: I'm just going to eat down here. I'll be up later.$0
Sebastian.Event.13: Don't you want to spend time with your family? We haven't had a conversation in a while. I'd like to catch up with you.$0
Sebastian.Event.14: Can't you get a clue? I don't want to. I'd rather stay down here.$5
Sebastian.Event.15: ...$2#$b#Sorry. I didn't mean to come off that way.$2
Sebastian.Event.16: Sebastian, sitting together at the table is one of the few times out of the day I see you.$2#$b#And it would really mean a lot to me if you joined us. Even @ is here too.$2
Sebastian.Event.17: *sigh* I suppose I'll eat upstairs tonight.$0
Sebastian.Event.18: I'm happy to hear that. Why don't you tell me about your coding project over dinner?$0
Sebastian.Event.23: I ate fish tacos with good company. There was a lot of fun conversation and laughs!
Sebastian.Event.24: It isn't healthy for my son to spend so much time in front of that computer of his.$6#$e#He should join us at the table more often.$0
Sebastian.Event.25: I can't remember the last time I held a conversation with Sebastian for that long.$0#$e#It was a pleasure having you over for dinner, @.$0
Sebastian.Event.26: Sebastian actually sat at the table with us. He never does that!$0
Sebastian.Event.27: My mom probably put him up to that didn't she...$0#$b#Well, I'm kinda glad in a weird that way she did. Having dinner with the family was nice.$1#$e#It's easy for me to get wrapped up in my work down there.$0
LegendaryTrio.Questline.02: Rare and unusual monsters have appeared in the following locations: highlands, marshlands, and crimson badlands. I must defeat them and deliver to Marlon their spoils.
LegendaryTrio.Questline.03: Find and defeat the 'Legendary Purple Mushroom Crab' at the marshlands. Deliver 'Mega Purple Mushroom' to Marlon.
LegendaryTrio.Questline.04: Find and defeat the 'Legendary Gold Slime' at the highlands. Deliver 'Gold Slime Egg' to Marlon.
LegendaryTrio.Questline.05: Find and defeat the 'Legendary Sand Scorpion' at the crimson badlands. Deliver 'Magic Lamp' to Marlon.
LegendaryTrio.Questline.06: Morning, @. I apologize for the short notice. I'm convening an important meeting at midnight at the guild.$0#$b#I expect you to be present. Others will be attending. I will explain all the details then.$0
LegendaryTrio.Questline.07: Thank you everyone for attending this meeting on such short notice. I'll get right to it.#$b#There have been sightings of 'legendary monsters' in several regions that we must investigate.
LegendaryTrio.Questline.08: Legendary monsters? What do you mean?$0
LegendaryTrio.Questline.09: Flamboyant ancient creatures possessing incredible power but are few in number and hide themselves.#$b#There's three legendaries: a purple mushroom crab at the marshlands, a golden slime at the highlands, and a diamond sand scorpion at the crimson badlands.
LegendaryTrio.Questline.10: *chuckle* They sound fascinating. I can't say I've ever seen a gold slime.$5
LegendaryTrio.Questline.11: We're hunting them down. Where do we start?$0
LegendaryTrio.Questline.12: Alesia and Isaac, search for the diamond scorpion in the badlands. Lance, the golden slime at the highlands. I will search the marshlands for the purple mushroom crab.#$b#@ will assist with all regions.$0
LegendaryTrio.Questline.14: We don't have a moment to lose.$0
LegendaryTrio.Questline.15: This is where the fun begins.$0
LegendaryTrio.Questline.16: Report back if you find anything. Good luck, and be safe.$0
LegendaryTrio.Questline.17: We've never faced monsters like these before. Hopefully, examining their spoils will teach us something valuable.$0
LegendaryTrio.Questline.18: Great work hunting down those legendary monsters.$0#$b#Your reward is waiting for you at the Castle Village Outpost.$0
Winery.Unlocked.1: Good morning, @. %farm has produced a lot of wine over the seasons! You should consider building a 'Winery'.$0#$b#I took the liberty of procuring the building blueprint for Robin. But be warned - it's quite pricey!$1
Winery.Unlocked.2: A winery is an expensive investment, @. It could take years before you start seeing any positive returns.$0
Bear.Event.09: Hey there, Chungus. Just had a chat with the nice lady in there.$3#$b#My friends are ready to help out on your farm, but only if you got one of those new fancy premium barns!$0#$b#A bear could rest up nice in one of those...$2
Bear.Event.10: Well, this maple syrup won't sleep itself off. Have a nice one.$1
Bear.Event.11: 我家里刚刚出现了一只熊！$4#$b#它还在我的订单本上写了些什么……$4#$e#看来我得去躺一会儿……$4

Andy.RejectBouquet: ……呃？我不知道你脑子抽什么风了会有这种想法，但我会忘了这事的。就当什么都没发生过。

Morris.Jellyfish2: It's instances like this that highlight the importance of community to me. I'm proud to represent the valley as its mayor!$1
Morris.Fair2: The Stardew Valley Fair has been a complete success today! We've managed to raise a considerable sum of money!$1
Morris.Halloween2: 我不太确定要变出这样的迷宫需要施什么魔法……但是这可以为镇民带来欢乐！$0
Morris.Ice2: I need to contact the Joja contractor who constructed my townhouse. This area would greatly benefit from the addition of cabins.$0#$e#It's a long trek out here and the townsfolk get tired. I believe if there were proper lodging it'd improve the spirit of the Ice Festival.$1
Morris.Christmas2: I entrusted Lewis with managing today's festivities, and he's exceeded expectations! I'm confident I made the perfect choice in selecting him as festival coordinator.$0
DesertFestival_Sophia: 我选择困难症犯了。也许我该闭上眼睛随便指一道菜！$1
DesertFestival_Susan: I purchased the cutest baby cactus from the strange man down those stairs. This green spiky guy has what I would say... a unique personality!$0
DesertFestival_Andy: 我不知道为啥会有人想在沙漠这片不毛之地常住。这里所见之处连块像样的阴凉都没有！
DesertFestival_Victor: My heart's pounding at the thought of what might be lurking around in that cave. It's making me anxious!$1#$e#Are you going in?$7
DesertFestival_Olivia: My, my! The artwork on display here exudes an exquisite essence of Calico culture.$0
DesertFestival_Alesia: The desert cavern monsters were no match for my bow.$0#$e#May Yoba guide your adventures, @. Enjoy the festival.$1
DesertFestival_Isaac: Hmph. Skull Cavern is too easy of a challenge for someone as skilled as me...$0
DesertFestival_Isaac_AlesiaGone: I doubt you'll surpass my egg rating.$1
DesertFestival_Camilla: You strike me as someone with an inquisitive nature, climbing up these cliffs...$0#$e#I prefer watching from afar. I tasked Jadu with some errands.$1
DesertFestival_Jadu: Greetings... One may find wares here not found anywhere else.$0
DesertFestival_Sophia_marriage: 嘿，我饿了。想等等和我一起去吃东西吗？$1
DesertFestival_Victor_marriage: This'll help protect you if you're in a pinch, alright? Good luck in there.[773]$1#$e#And here's another![773]$3
DesertFestival_Olivia_marriage: If you come across any rare Gotoran furniture, do let me know, dear.$0
DesertFestival_Lance_marriage: Are you enjoying the festival? Tell me if you find any rare artifacts.$0#$e#The cactus man... I recognize him from somewhere. But from where?...$5
DesertFestival_Claire_marriage: 如果没有防晒霜，我没法在这么大的太阳下坚持太久。不过老实说来，这样温暖的阳光真的让人感觉很惬意！$1
DesertFestival_Wizard_marriage: There's an undeniable allure to the desert festival that defies explanation.#$e#Whatever its essence may be, there's no denying the magic that permeates every moment.

crop.joja-berry-machine.description: Plant these in the spring, summer or fall.

crop.joja-berry-starter.description: Plant these in the spring, summer or fall. Takes 25 days to mature, and continues to produce. The machine is impassable. A light turns red when ready to harvest.

crop.monster-stalk.name: Monster Stalk

crop.salal-shrub.name: Salal Shrub

object.aegis-elixir.name: Aegis Elixir
object.aegis-elixir.description: For a brief time, you become immune to damage. Stacks with speed potions.
object.aged-blue-moon-wine.name: Aged Blue Moon Wine
object.aged-blue-moon-wine.description: Sophia's iridium aged hand-crafted wine from Blue Moon Vineyard. Makes a wonderful gift!
object.armor-elixir.name: Armor Elixir
object.armor-elixir.description: Fortifies your body. Stacks with speed potions.
object.aurora-vineyard-property-deed.des: It needs to be given to an authority figure for review.
object.baby-lunaloo.name: Baby Lunaloo
object.baby-lunaloo.description: A luminescent jellyfish, also known as a moonlight jelly. It's very small, and has a lot of growing up to do.
object.baked-berry-oatmeal.name: Baked Berry Oatmeal
object.baked-berry-oatmeal.description: Warm, chewy, sweet baked oatmeal bursting with berries. It gives you a boost of energy that lasts the whole day.
object.barbarian-elixir.name: Barbarian Elixir
object.barbarian-elixir.description: Enrages the user with barbaric strength.

object.big-bark-burger.description: The Triple B. It has a chewy consistency and is very juicy.

object.gravity-elixir.name: Gravity Elixir

object.joja-veggie.description: A magically modified organism (MMO). Contains perplexing healing properties, fetching a high price.
object.king-salmon.name: King Salmon
object.king-salmon.description: A huge salmon, distinguished by its large scales.

object.kittyfish.description: A magical fish summoned by Camilla. It likes scratches under the chin.

object.lunaloo.name: Lunaloo

object.mermaids-bracelet.name: Mermaid's Bracelet
object.mermaids-bracelet.description: A memory of your time under the sea.
object.meteor-carp.name: Meteor Carp
object.minnow.name: Minnow
object.monster-fruit.name: Monster Fruit
object.monster-fruit.description: It has an eyeball-like pattern. It's the closest someone can get to tasting a Stardrop.
object.monster-mushroom.name: Monster Mushroom
object.monster-mushroom.description: It's huge. Suspends itself on a high-up plant to avoid ground predators.
object.ornate-treasure-chest.name: Ornate Treasure Chest
object.ornate-treasure-chest.description: It's filled to the brim with gold and gems.
object.property-deed.name: Property Deed
object.property-deed.description: It needs to be given to an authority figure for review.
object.puppyfish.name: Puppyfish
object.puppyfish.description: This fish wants nothing but pets and snacks.
object.radioactive-bass.name: Radioactive Bass
object.radioactive-bass.description: This doesn't look healthy for the environment.
object.razor-trout.name: Razor Trout
object.razor-trout.description: An invasive species released by someone... It has a pattern along its body that heavily resembles the letter 'J'.
object.rusty-blade.name: Rusty Blade
object.rusty-blade.description: It once belonged to an adventurer...
object.sea-sponge.name: Sea Sponge
object.sea-sponge.description: A very diverse multi-cellular animal. They are important in nutrient cycles in coral reefs.
object.seahorse.name: Seahorse
object.seahorse.description: A tiny fish that makes a home in coral reefs.
object.shiny-lunaloo.name: Shiny Lunaloo
object.shiny-lunaloo.description: A luminescent jellyfish, Also known as a moonlight jelly. It has a different color and shape.
object.slime-berry.name: Slime Berry
object.slime-berry.description: It's covered in an odd gooey substance.
object.starfish.name: Starfish
object.starfish.description: Referred to as sea stars because of their star-shaped appearance.
object.super-joja-cola.name: Super Joja Cola
object.super-joja-cola.description: DISCLAIMER: Small chance skin will turn blue after consumption.
object.super-starfruit.name: Super Starfruit
object.super-starfruit.description: It's symbolic to the Junimo. As a gift, it signifies the desire to move in together as friends.
object.swirl-stone.name: Swirl Stone
object.torpedo-trout.name: Torpedo Trout
object.torpedo-trout.description: This fish is capable of swimming up to 68 miles per hour.
object.undeadfish.name: Undeadfish
object.void-delight.name: Void Delight
object.void-eel.name: Void Eel
object.void-pebble.name: Void Pebble
object.void-pebble.description: Although small, it's dense and hot to the touch.
object.void-root.name: Void Root
object.void-root.description: A strange dark energy is emitting from it.
object.void-salmon-sushi.name: Void Salmon Sushi
object.void-shard.name: Void Shard
object.void-shard.description: The stone is consumed by dark magic.
object.void-soul.name: Void Soul
object.void-soul.description: The corrupted life essence of what once was. It's a key ingredient in potion brewing.
object.poison-mushroom.name: Poison Mushroom
object.poison-mushroom.description: An innocent-looking mushroom. Potentially fatal if consumed.
object.red-baneberry.name: Red Baneberry
object.red-baneberry.description: A delightful snack for birds, but not for humans.
object.lucky-four-leaf-clover.name: 四叶草
object.lucky-four-leaf-clover.descriptio: 据说能带来好运，用来送礼很合适。
object.mushroom-berry-rice.name: 蘑菇红果拌饭
object.mushroom-berry-rice.description: 一道奇怪的菜，吃了以后会暂时减少最大体力。
object.grass-carp.name: 草鱼
object.grass-carp.description: 一种大型草食鱼，喜欢植被丰富的森林湖泊。
object.bull-trout.name: 强壮红点鲑
object.bull-trout.description: 喜欢有砾石河床的寒冷河流和湖泊。
object.dried-sand-dollar.name: Sand Dollar
object.dried-sand-dollar.description: Has an appearance of a large silver coin.
object.water-grub.name: Water Grub
object.water-grub.description: Uses its pincers to hunt prey.
object.ancient-fiber.name: Ancient Fiber
object.ancient-fiber.description: A sturdy edible fern branch that once flourished.
object.salal-berry.name: Salal Berry
object.salal-berry.description: A sweet berry filled with antioxidants.
object.mixed-berry-pie.name: Mixed Berry Pie
object.mixed-berry-pie.description: A delicious combination of sweet and tart that can't be beat.
object.big-conch.name: Conch
object.big-conch.description: If you put your ear to it, you can hear the ocean.
object.smelly-rafflesia.name: Rafflesia
object.smelly-rafflesia.description: Expels a foul odor that attracts insects.
object.mushroom-colony.name: Mushroom Colony
object.bearberrys.name: Bearberry
object.dulse-seaweed.name: Dulse Seaweed
object.dulse-seaweed.description: One of the fastest naturally growing sources of protein.
object.seaweed-salad.name: Seaweed Salad
object.seaweed-salad.description: A healthy dish from the ocean.
object.winter-star-rose.name: Winter Star Rose
object.goldenrod.name: Goldenrod
object.thistle.name: Thistle
object.thistle.description: A common flower found in mountainous regions.
object.ferngill-primrose.name: Ferngill Primrose
object.ferngill-primrose.description: Has a spicy taste to it.
object.flower-cookie.name: Flower Cookie
object.flower-cookie.description: Smells as sweet as it tastes.
object.sports-drink.name: Sports Drink
object.sports-drink.description: A fruity beverage filled with electrolytes.
object.stamina-capsule.name: Stamina Capsule
object.stamina-capsule.description: Stimulates the body. The effect lasts all day.
object.snatcher-worm.name: Snatcher Worm
object.snatcher-worm.description: Its large jaws are powerful enough to crush rocks.
weapon.diamond-wand.name: Diamond Wand
weapon.diamond-wand.description: A magic relic from Galdora. Teleports enemies away from the user. Effective against flyers.
weapon.tempered-galaxy-dagger.name: Tempered Galaxy Dagger
weapon.tempered-galaxy-dagger.descriptio: The power of the cosmos courses through you, granting awesome power and defensive abilities.
weapon.tempered-galaxy-hammer.name: Tempered Galaxy Hammer
weapon.tempered-galaxy-hammer.descriptio: The power of the cosmos courses through you, granting awesome power and defensive abilities.
weapon.tempered-galaxy-sword.name: Tempered Galaxy Sword
weapon.tempered-galaxy-sword.description: The power of the cosmos courses through you, granting awesome power and defensive abilities.
ShopsDialogue.Alesia: Do you need ammunition or potions?
ShopsDialogue.Camilla: These elixirs give abilities some say are... unnatural.
ShopsDialogue.Isaac: Your money isn't worth much here.
ShopsDialogue.GreyJunimo: I trade rocks for yellow sparkle rocks!
ShopsDialogue.PurpleJunimo: Me have rare things! You want?
ShopsDialogue.RedJunimo: Sell old things for yellow rocks!
ShopsDialogue.Jace: Let me know if you want to inspect anything.
ShopsDialogue.Chloe1: We have a lot of deserts today...
ShopsDialogue.Axel1: These items are OUT of this WORLD!
ShopsDialogue.Claire: 欢迎光临 Joja 超市。
ShopsDialogue.ClaireJoja: It's Joja Day. Seeds are 20 percent off.
ShopsDialogue.Martin: Hello! How may I help you?
ShopsDialogue.MartinJoja: It's Joja Day. Seeds are 20 percent off.
JojaDay.Juliet.1: Welcome to JojaMart, where our prices match our service. Budget all the way!$0
GalaxySlingshot: Iridium ore fired from this slingshot are given cosmic energy
Victor.CharacterDialogue.001: Oh, hey there! You're the new owner of %farm Farm!$1#$b#I'm Victor. It's a pleasure to meet you... @, is it?$3
Victor.CharacterDialogue.002: Sorry. I'm not sure if I even want to dance myself...$0
Victor.CharacterDialogue.003: @... you... you broke my heart. I put my life into you and you... do this to me?$2#$b#Please...$2#$b#Tell me what I did wrong. What did I do? Did I hurt you?$2#$e#@, please...$2
Victor.CharacterDialogue.004: You want to give our relationship another go, @?$6#$b#I'm not so sure about this...$2#$b#You really hurt me when you divorced me, @. I should take more time to think about this, but...$2#$b#I want to give us another chance too!$3#$b#I feel like we can both learn from our mistakes and build our relationship into something healthy.$4#$b#This will require effort from both of us, but I believe we can make it work.$3
Victor.CharacterDialogue.005: @, don't talk to me...$2#$b#We are not friends. Not after what you did...$2
Victor.CharacterDialogue.006: Wh-what? A wilted bouquet?$2#$b#Ugh. It was something stupid I did, wasn't it?$2#$e#So, we're back to being friends I guess?$0
Victor.CharacterDialogue.007: I'm impressed Robin can build a house that fast.$0#$b#I wonder how she does it?$1
Victor.CharacterDialogue.008: I'm impressed Robin can build a house that fast.$0#$b#I wonder how she does it?$1
Victor.CharacterDialogue.009: Hey there, sweetie. I bought this stardrop fruit for you.$4#$b#It came all the way from the Fern Islands! It's fresh from a healthy Cellstar tree.$1#$b#I love you, honey.$4
Victor.CharacterDialogue.010: You want to date me, @? I feel the same way! I was a bit too nervous to make the first move.$4#$b#I'm happy you did, @. You just made me the happiest person alive!$1
Victor.CharacterDialogue.011: I didn't know you felt the same way, @. This makes me so happy!$4#$e#I'm a bit nervous, aren't you?$4
Victor.CharacterDialogue.012: !!!$7#$b#You... you want to get married? Is this you proposing to me, @!?$7#$b#I accept! I'm so excited to spend the rest of my life with you. I'll let Mayor Lewis know. Oh, I need to let my mom know too!$1
Victor.CharacterDialogue.014: I don't feel the same way, @. I'm sorry.$2#$e#What else do you want me to say? I said no.$0
Victor.CharacterDialogue.015: @, I don't like you that way. I don't mean to disappoint you.$2
Victor.CharacterDialogue.016: I don't think it's a good idea for us to date, @.$0#$e#I don't know you well enough.$0
Victor.CharacterDialogue.017: I'm not ready for a commitment like this. I'm sorry, @.$2#$e#I said I'm not ready.$5
Victor.CharacterDialogue.018: @, I... really like you but...$2#$b#I don't think I'm ready to date you. I'm sorry.$2
Victor.CharacterDialogue.019: Uhh... I'm going to pretend you didn't just do that.$0#$e#Leave me alone, @.$5
Victor.CharacterDialogue.020: Are you trying to cheat on your spouse with me!? What's wrong with you?$5#$e#You're disgusting. Get away from me.$5
Victor.CharacterDialogue.021: @? What are you doing? What would your spouse do if I told them you just tried this on me?$5#$e#I won't tell your spouse. Please. Just... stop.$2
Victor.CharacterDialogue.022: You want to marry me? You're already married, @. Please stop.$2#$e#@. Are you drunk or something? Go away before I tell your spouse.$0
Victor.CharacterDialogue.023: I think we need to spend more time together before we can take that step, @.$6#$e#Sorry. I didn't mean to bring down your mood. It's important I'm transparent about this.$2
Victor.CharacterDialogue.024: It's a little too early for this, don't you think?$0#$e#I appreciate the thought, @.$6
Victor.CharacterDialogue.025: Uhh... It's still a no, @. Sorry.$0
Victor.CharacterDialogue.027: That looks pretty. Did you buy it from a ghost on the beach?$0#$b#I've read books about mariner ghosts that sell mermaid pendants.$6
Victor.CharacterDialogue.028: So. Here's what's going to happen, @. I am going to walk away and pretend you never did that.$0
Victor.CharacterDialogue.030: There's sand stuck in my hair...$2#$b#Nothing a hot shower can't solve! Back to Stardew Valley!$1
Victor.CharacterDialogue.031: I wonder what those other islands out there are like...$1
Victor.CharacterDialogue.032: Have you explored much of the island, @?$3#$b#A place like this is bound to harbor a great many mysteries.$1
Victor.CharacterDialogue.033: 格斯这热带饮品单真是够讲究的！我觉得我应该来一杯“灵玉之曦”！$1
Victor.CharacterDialogue.034: I've read about that volcano in an adventurer book.$3#$b#A clan of dwarves used lava as an energy source!$1
Victor.CharacterDialogue.035: Sophia and I are watching 'My Villain Academia' today. Should be interesting.$3
Victor.CharacterDialogue.036: I had fun watching TV with you, Sophia.$3
Victor.CharacterDialogue.037: It was great hanging out with you, Sophia.$1
Victor.CharacterDialogue.039: Perhaps I'll indulge myself with some top shelf wine soon.$1
Victor.CharacterDialogue.040: It's been some time since I graduated from Pellcar University.$6#$b#My mother has been nagging me to get a job somewhere. Anywhere.$2#$e#I understand I need to find a job but... I just... I need more time.$2#$q 1001/1002 jobquestion_followup#Do you think I'm lazy because I haven't found a job yet?#$r 1001 50 jobquestion_no#You aren't lazy, Victor. You need more time to decide what you want to do. Look at me! I didn't know what I was doing until recently.#$r 1002 0 jobquestion_neutral#You could try out a part-time internship to see if it's something you like. At least your mom would get off your back?#$r 1002 -125 jobquestion_yes#I wouldn't call it lazy but... you've been out of school for over a year, Victor.
Victor.CharacterDialogue.041: That's right. You used to work in accounting at Joja. You completely switched gears and became a farmer.$3#$b#Your story gives me hope for my future, @. Thank you.
